mapper.select:
select calendar_no,userno, calendar_title, content, start1, end1 from CALENDAR
and userno = #{userno}
mapper.insert:
select CAL_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into CALENDAR (calendar_no, userno, calendar_title, content, start1, end1) VALUES (#{calendarNo}, #{userno}, #{calendarTitle}, #{content}, #{start1} - INTERVAL '9' HOUR , #{end1}- INTERVAL '9' HOUR )
